body.name: Office Computer Desk Chair, Ergonomic Mid-Back Mesh Rolling Work Swivel Task Chairs with Wheels, Comfortable Lumbar Support, Comfy Flip-up Arms for Home, Bedroom, Gaming, Study, Student, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 55 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Comfortable Seat】- Ergonomic features an all-elastic premium mesh back and a high-density sponge seat making the mesh office chair a good choice for all-day comfortable office seating. The unique mesh design is skin-friendly and breathable, which keeps you cool all day.

【Ergonomic Lumbar Support】- The ergonomically designed backrest of our ergonomic office chair has prominent lumbar support to fit the natural curvature of the spine. The Computer Desk Chair provides comfortable support, which helps you maintain a relaxed posture during long hours of work.

【Multifunctional Mechanism】- The seat height of this 360° Rotating chair can be easily adjusted by the pneumatic adjustment lever, and the adjustment range is 18.5-22.2 inches. Besides, the rocking mode helps you to relax from hard work. It is perfect for the office, bedroom, study room, living room, or gaming room.

【Space-saving】- Flip-up armrests are available and won't be in your way when not in use. The Armrests of the computer chair provide comfortable support for your arms and can be flipped up to save space effectively while not in use.

【Smooth Movement & Stability】- Our comfy office desk chair comes with smooth and multi-directional casters, which allow you to move the chair around effortlessly. They can run smoothly on tile, wooden floors, carpets, and other floorings. The large 5-star base increases stability even at the full height range. The maximum weight capacity is 250 lbs.

【Easy Assembly】 - The home office chair comes with installation instructions and all necessary hardware and tools. We also offer a video to help you, allowing the office chair installation to be completed within 10-15 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Comfortable Seat Cushion A high-density sponge seat makes the office chair a good choice for all-day comfortable office seating. And, the waterfall edge design ensures your thighs stay relaxed. Ergonomic Backrest Design The sturdy backrest frame supports the natural curve of the spine, allowing you to maintain a good sitting posture. With a back storage basket, make this office chair more beautiful and practical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice chair, just don't sit on the edge of your seat!
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I like this chair. I love to cook, and the chair helps me through those "bad back" days that still linger many years after surgery.I've had mine for a few weeks... I honestly don't remember any sticking points putting it together - I think it took 30-40 minutes by myself, but I don't rush these things like I did when I was youngerAt max height, it's plenty high for working at a standaed 30" high counter.Just be careful leaning forward - I've had the chair recoil backwards across the kitchen and nearly put me on my narrow rear end a few times.(For reference, I'm 6'0 and about 135lbs) There's plenty of room, and the footrest works fine for me at max height.Seriously, if you're any less clumsy that I am, or you're just using the chair at a desk instead of in a kitchen, you'll be fine.Oh... any and all stains and marks on the chair are from me. I put my kitchen things through a lot!
